title: dikku vErillai
sahitya:
dikku vEillai tiruvaDiyallAl tiru mayilApuri vaLar kapAli


anupallavi

  (rudr) akka mAlai veNNIr aNiyEn mei anbumilEn pErinbam virumbinEn


caraNam    shiva shiva enrundan tiru nAma ghOsham sheyyum shivanEsha shelvaruDan shErndilEn bhava shuzhalil shikki avalap-pozhudhu pOkki
pAzhAnEn puzhuvil kIzhAnEn Ezhaikku
